com.virgilsecurity.purekit

Class PureContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.virgilsecurity.purekit.PureContext

  • public class PureContext
extends java.lang.Object
    PureContext class represents dependencies needed to initialize Pure.

      • createContext

        public static PureContext createContext(java.lang.String at,
                                        java.lang.String nm,
                                        java.lang.String bu,
                                        java.lang.String sk,
                                        java.lang.String pk,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> externalPublicKeys)
                                 throws PureException,
                                        java.net.MalformedURLException
        Designed for usage with Virgil Cloud storage.
        Parameters:
        at - Application token. AT.****
        nm - Nonrotatable master secret. NM.****
        bu - Backup public key. BU.****
        sk - App secret key. SK.****
        pk - Service public key. PK.****
        externalPublicKeys - External public keys that will be added during encryption by default. Map key is dataId, value is list of base64 public keys.
        Throws:
        PureException
        java.net.MalformedURLException

        public static PureContext createContext(java.lang.String at,

                                        java.lang.String kmsServiceAddress)
                                 throws PureException,
                                        java.net.MalformedURLException
        Designed for usage with Virgil Cloud storage.
        Parameters:
        at - Application token. AT.****
        nm - Nonrotatable master secret. NM.****
        bu - Backup public key. BU.****
        sk - App secret key. SK.****
        pk - Service public key. PK.****
        externalPublicKeys - External public keys that will be added during encryption by default. Map key is dataId, value is list of base64 public keys.
        pheServiceAddress - PHE service address.
        pureServiceAddress - Pure service address.
        Throws:
        PureException
